attributes.title: This is possibly the worst app i have ever downloaded
attributes.review: So this morning i woke up and decided to support our rapist cheeto lookin president. I downloaded and was on there for about 5 minutes. As soon as I went on a different app, my phone started glitching and pictures of our president started showing up on my screen. I went to the apple store a couple hours later in the day to see if i could get my phone fixed. it didnâ€™t work out and the photos kept popping up. i went home and noticed that i was feeling a little dizzy and nauseous. my parents then started complaining too and they were around my phone. we went to the hospital and got tested for the covid-19. turns out we had just recently - as in that day - got the coronavirus. we asked our doctors what gave us it and they told us if we were around anything. we said no but then i realized that i had been around my phone and so had my parents so i asked them to check my phone. low and behold it was infected with something. honestly i believe that it was the pictures of trump that set it off. so yeah this app is gonna get a 1 star review ğŸ™‚
